channel.title: More NSFW: Hunting Love--the first in an epic L4D love tale!
channel.description:
As Hunter sat on his sofa, watching the game lazily, Huntette came in the door. Hunter looked over with dismay; he just wanted some alone time, that's all. Why did huntette need to barge in all the time? Every time he was killing a survivor, she would barge in and demand the kill for herself. He hated her sometimes. Oh well. It would all be over soon, once the divorce went through.
Suddenly, Hunter smelled something familiar. Boomer had vomited on a survivor! Leaping up, a gleam in his eye, he pushed Huntette to the floor and leaped out the door. As he began jumping over trees, past buildings and over cars, he could already taste the flesh. He couldn't wait to tear into some nice, fresh human. The aroma was getting stronger; he was almost there! He leaped fervently, going mad with desire. Then, he saw it; a lone survivor, male, was fending off hordes of zombies by himself! He had to admire that survivor. It took skill with a gun to fend off so many of his brethren. But it had to end. He needed sustenance!
Hunter took his aim and, with one fell swoop, leapt straight onto the survivor. Suddenly, he froze. It was something in the survivor's eyes--something he had never seen before. It was truly beautiful! This survivor was a work of art--handsome, built, kind, everything he needed in a woman. But this was a man! Surely it--no. It didn't matter! This was love.
Suddenly, Hunter found himself embraced in a kiss that seemed to last forever. The survivor was holding rubbing Hunter's crotch with his hand, something he had long desired. Hunter couldn't control himself! He unzipped his pants and flipped the survivor on his side. He tore open its pants with his claws and prepared his long, throbbing dick to enter. Wild with desire, he thrust his emasculate dick into the survivor's clenching anus. As he thrust ever longer, pumping harder with each turn, Hunter was fulfilling a desire he had long left empty. He could feel the survivor's shit coming out of his anus; this was his chance! He grabbed the shit and squeezed it between his hands. Suddenly, he crushed his balls with his fist, smearing the shit all over them. The pain shot through him, giving him an adrenaline rush.Suddenly, he felt an insatiable desire welling up inside of him. He looked down. He had punctured the survivor's stomach, and it was bleeding profusely. He lapped up the blood, drinking with the might and gusto of a thousand men.
The survivor's penis was just hanging there, limp, a fresh target. Hunter began chewing on it, puncturing skin with each bite. He loved this; it was the best experience he ever had.
And then he woke up, sweating with desire and excitement in his bed. He sobbed, crushed that it was merely a dream. He went over to his dresser and found his axe. Lowering his pants, he aimed his axe at his penis, and with one fell swoop, slashed it off violently. He picked it up from the floor and pointed the cut end at his mouth. Squeezing, he poured the guts of his penis into his mouth, lapping and chewing contentedly. And then he died.
